overview: AI-powered knowledge system integrating OneNote, website content, and property data with HubSpot. Hybrid search with LLM-powered query processing and verifiable citations.

deliverables.name: Architecture & System Design
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria:
Define system components, integration points, and security model.
✓ Complete system architecture diagram
✓ Integration point specifications
✓ Security model documentation
✓ Scalability considerations documented

deliverables.name: Azure Infrastructure Setup
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria:
Configure cloud resources, networking, and security policies.
✓ Azure resources provisioned
✓ Network security configured
✓ IAM policies implemented
✓ Environment configurations ready

deliverables.name: OneNote (Microsoft Graph) Integration
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria:
Implement secure notebook/page sync via Graph API.
✓ OAuth authentication working
✓ Notebook enumeration functional
✓ Page content extraction verified
✓ Incremental sync implemented

deliverables.name: Website Content Extraction (API/Umbraco)
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria:
Build API-based ingestion for website/Umbraco content.
✓ Umbraco API integration complete
✓ Content parsing validated
✓ Metadata extraction working
✓ Change detection implemented

deliverables.name: Content Processing Pipeline
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria:
Parsing, chunking, metadata enrichment & validation.
✓ Document chunking strategy validated
✓ Metadata enrichment pipeline working
✓ Quality validation checks passing
✓ Error handling robust

deliverables.name: Search Infrastructure
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria:
Configure hybrid search (BM25 + vector) & filters.
✓ Azure Cognitive Search configured
✓ BM25 keyword search working
✓ Vector embeddings indexed
✓ Filter queries validated

deliverables.name: Query Processing Engine
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria:
Stage-1 LLM: intent detection & retrieval plan.
✓ Query intent classification working
✓ Retrieval strategy selection functional
✓ Query expansion implemented
✓ Multi-turn context handling verified

deliverables.name: LLM Integration
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria:
Stage-2 LLM: answer synthesis with guardrails.
✓ Azure OpenAI integration complete
✓ Answer generation working
✓ Hallucination guardrails active
✓ Response quality validated

deliverables.name: Citation System
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria:
Verifiable citations per answer (per-client templates).
✓ Source tracking implemented
✓ Citation formatting working
✓ Deep links functional
✓ Template system flexible

deliverables.name: API Development
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria:
REST API with auth & rate limiting.
✓ RESTful endpoints documented
✓ API authentication working
✓ Rate limiting configured
✓ Error responses standardized

deliverables.name: HubSpot UI Component (Phase-1)
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria:
Embed existing React app in HubSpot via iframe.
✓ iframe integration working
✓ Cross-origin communication secure
✓ Basic styling matches HubSpot
✓ Load times acceptable

deliverables.name: HubSpot UI Component (Phase-2)
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria:
Build HubSpot Native Frontend for the Application.
✓ HubSpot UI Extensions implemented
✓ Native component styling complete
✓ User workflows validated
✓ Mobile responsiveness verified

deliverables.name: Integration Testing
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria:
End-to-end tests with real data scenarios.
✓ Test scenarios documented
✓ Integration tests passing
✓ Edge cases covered
✓ Performance benchmarks met

deliverables.name: Performance Optimization
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria:
Ensure ~sub-2s p50 response times.
✓ Response times under 2s (p50)
✓ Caching strategy implemented
✓ Query optimization complete
✓ Load testing passed

deliverables.name: Documentation (Technical + Ops)
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria:
Provide technical docs and runbooks.
✓ Technical architecture documented
✓ API documentation complete
✓ Operations runbooks created
✓ Troubleshooting guides available

deliverables.name: Property Data Integration
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria:
Extend system to handle property-specific metadata.
✓ Property schema defined
✓ Metadata ingestion working
✓ Property search filters active
✓ Data validation passing

deliverables.name: Availability System Connection
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria:
Integrate with booking/availability data sources.
✓ Availability API integration complete
✓ Real-time sync working
✓ Booking status accurate
✓ Calendar integration functional

deliverables.name: Advanced Search Features
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria:
Enable multi-criteria filtering for property matching.
✓ Multi-faceted search working
✓ Filter combinations tested
✓ Result ranking validated
✓ Search UI responsive

deliverables.name: Recommendation Engine
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria:
Build scoring algorithm for property suggestions.
✓ Recommendation logic implemented
✓ Scoring algorithm tuned
✓ Personalization working
✓ Results quality validated

deliverables.name: Response Generation
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria:
Develop brand-aligned template system for sales responses.
✓ Template system flexible
✓ Brand voice consistent
✓ Dynamic content insertion working
✓ Multi-format support validated

deliverables.name: Sales UI Component
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria:
Create a specialised interface for sales team workflows.
✓ Sales dashboard functional
✓ Lead tracking integrated
✓ Quick actions accessible
✓ User training completed

deliverables.name: Sales-Specific Testing
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria:
Validate functionality with real enquiry scenarios.
✓ Sales workflows tested
✓ Enquiry handling validated
✓ Response accuracy verified
✓ User acceptance obtained

deliverables.name: Security Hardening
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria:
Ensure OWASP compliance and implement vulnerability prevention measures.
✓ OWASP Top 10 addressed
✓ Penetration testing passed
✓ Security audit complete
✓ Vulnerability scan clean

deliverables.name: Monitoring Setup
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria:
Configure logging, metrics, and alerting systems.
✓ Application logging configured
✓ Metrics dashboards created
✓ Alert rules defined
✓ Incident response tested

deliverables.name: Deployment Pipeline
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria:
Set up automated deployment and rollback procedures.
✓ CI/CD pipeline working
✓ Automated testing integrated
✓ Rollback procedures tested
✓ Deployment documentation complete

deliverables.name: Knowledge Transfer
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria:
Conduct documentation and handover sessions with internal teams.
✓ Knowledge transfer sessions completed
✓ Documentation reviewed
✓ Q&A sessions held
✓ Team sign-off obtained

deliverables.name: Initial Data Load
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria:
Perform first-time ingestion of data and validate integrity.
✓ Historical data migrated
✓ Data integrity verified
✓ Search index built
✓ Validation reports clean

deliverables.name: Project Management & Coordination
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria:
Overall project coordination, stakeholder management, and delivery oversight.
✓ Weekly status reports delivered
✓ Stakeholder meetings conducted
✓ Risk mitigation plans active
✓ Budget tracking maintained
✓ Timeline adherence monitored

deliverables.name: Account Management
deliverables.acceptanceCriteria:
Client relationship management and commercial oversight.
✓ Client satisfaction maintained
✓ Commercial terms managed
✓ Escalations handled
✓ Future opportunities identified
